Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why am I here? I suppose you could say I'm
checking out the competition.
<PAGE>
I took the liberty of observing which types of
crops you're growing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SPECIAL>From the looks of things, I needn't have worried.
There's nothing really noteworthy!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness, what a sour face. Are you implying I
ought not judge a book by its cover?
<PAGE>
Perhaps you are right. It would be rude to draw
conclusions based only on appearances. Well
then, how about this?
<PAGE>
Bring a <BLUE>vegetable</BLUE> you have grown to my
mansion sometime, when the weather is nice
and sunny.
<PAGE>
I will have it prepared and judge its quality based
on its taste. How does that sound?
<PAGE>
You have such confidence in your produce, so
I'm sure you can manage at least that, right?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. It's agreed, then. I shall await you and
your finest vegetable. Good day.
